column1: '''L'Associazione romana studi Tolkieniani''' (Italian: Roman Association of Tolkien Studies) was founded in [[2005]] in Rome
column2: Italy as a non-profit association. It has close links with Proudneck
column3: a Tolkien Society smial in Rome
column4: founded in [[2000]].{{fact}} Since its foundation it has hosted and co-organised several events on [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]] but has no regularly recurring ones.{{fact}}
